description: As we bask in the afterglow of possibly one of the best GW previews in years, let’s find out what everyone thought. New Imperial Guard Codex and Death Korps of Krieg Imperial Guard get a new codex, a new combat patrol and six new Death Korps kits, along with a Krieg army set with limited […]
title: World Championships of Warhammer Previews: The Goonhammer Roundtable

description: It’s been a huge week for Warhammer Underworlds in the backdrop of the World Championships of Warhammer; in the middle of the week a bunch of new rules were digitally released, and then this weekend, a few actually-new warbands showed up along with a whole bunch more warbands returning with new rules. The intrepid Jake […]
title: Warhammer Underworlds: The New Warbands

description: We are back with the next Age of Sigmar fourth edition Battletome: Slaves to Darkness. A thank-you to Games Workshop for sending us a copy of the Battletome to review.  Here it is: the first real battletome for Age of Sigmar fourth edition. Sort of. So far we’ve had Skaven and Stormcast, as expected, as the two […]
title: Age of Sigmar Slaves to Darkness 4th Edition Battletome – The Goonhammer Review
